name: Brunch Serving Event
description: Help serve brunch to the residents of R.H. Myers Apartments
rsvpDesc:
Schedule (Times are approximate): 

10:00 - Crew assembles (we may not be the only crew of volunteers) 
10:00-11:30 - Set up the room (set tables, water glasses, coffee, tea, etc.) 
11:30 - Residents admitted (pre-plated food, pour beverages) 
12:15-1:00 - Clean up 

Lunch is included 

Spouses, significant others, and responsible children are welcome!

name: Forest City Lodge Repack Event
description:
Please consider volunteering for our very own Forest City Lodge repack event. 
We have reserved a group time for Saturday, January 17th from 9am to noon. 
In the past, members of University Heights Lodge No. 738 had a blast volunteering for these events. 
We repacked thousands of pounds of food for distribution, made some new friends and helped to make our lodge more visible and active in the local community. 
This also helped to strengthen our own brotherhood through mutual service to the community, with brethren and their families participating (yes, family members are welcome and encouraged to attend so long as they are at least 14 years of age). 
You must register online for this event at the link below.
rsvpDesc: You must register with the Food Bank to attend this event. There is a limit of 15 for registrations. Please click on the following link to register: Food Bank Registration Please also see our current bulletin for detailed instructions.

name: Peanut Butter and Jelly Sandwiches
description:
Come join us on the first Friday of every other month to help make PB&J sandwiches for the unhoused in Cleveland. 
We will meet at Temple Israel Ner Tamid at 8:30 PM.
